snippet.title: Explorer of Yggdrasil - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
After rescuing an armless mage during a chance encounter, the explorer Mei embarks on a journey to reach the top of Yggdrasil, and to uncover the mystery of her forgotten past.

Explorer of Yggdrasil on Kagura Games https://www.kaguragames.com/product/explorer-of-yggdrasil/

Explorer of Yggdrasil on Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/1328900/Explorer_of_Yggdrasil/
